channel.title: Comments on: Devo to perform 1978 debut record in London

item.title: By: C. Jones
item.dc:creator: C. Jones
item.description:
Devo - live in London. Sounds great. Eric, I'm going to the show. Send me an email and I'll send you a poster or T-shirt from London show. My email is cucumber667@hotmail.com
Cheers
CJ
item.content:encoded:
Devo – live in London. Sounds great. Eric, I’m going to the show. Send me an email and I’ll send you a poster or T-shirt from London show. My email is cucumber667@hotmail.com

Cheers

CJ

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I might have to try and catch this show. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: I might have to try and catch this show. Thanks!
